overview:
Amos Abdallah currently holds the position as Creative Director at Creatives, which he co-founded in 2010.

Creatives represents a revolutionary group of designers, marketing minds, and experienced developers who have partnered to deliver digital solutions that are both engaging and visually demanding.

“My inspiration comes from the ordinary everyday human behaviour, and from compulsively analysing everything. It comes from working together with bright people, and from trying to understand all manner of things. I also get inspired from good story telling.

I have the good fortune to work in cross-disciplinary teams with brilliant people who know technology well.

My name is Amos Abdallah and my job is to draw out the potential of technologies and to make it simple and useful for normal people.”
